Details.Name: Dining
Details.Feature: S$1 = 1.2 miles (Local)
S$1 = 2 miles (Overseas)
Dining deals at over 1,000 outlets islandwide with DBS Indulge

Details.Name: Shopping
Details.Feature: Exclusive discounts up to 50% off with the DBS Shopper App

Details.Name: Air Miles
Details.Feature: S$1 = 1.2 miles (Local)
S$1 = 2 miles (Overseas)
S$1 = 3 miles, on all online Flight and Hotel transactions (Capped at S$10,000 per month)
Miles are awarded in DBS Points (1 DBS Point = 2 air miles)
Complimentary travel insurance coverage of up to $1 million
10,000 bonus miles upon paying annual membership fee
2 Complimentary Global Airport Lounge Access with Priority Pass Membership
